answers.answer: Baby can sence ur depression so I believe must b quite bad for baby

I'd be more worried about health issues like blood pressure/preeclampsia if your depression involves high stress. It's not going to HURT baby normally just to be depressed, but getting to tense/high blood pressure COULD cause like preterm labor. I've seen women who lost their partners during pregnancy and the baby was ok. :) Don't worry too much or let it make your depression worse.

question: How bad is depression for the baby???
title: depression/baby
